vsParam: Come on, what the heck? Give me a break...

Oh, it's you. I got a report that monsters in Ribrum went crazy
suddenly, so I went there to repel them and just got back.

The Guard was sent to Ribrum? I guess not only
the situation in the Academy is bad...

Yeah. We were sent to various regions to
repel monsters. As you can see, we're short of hands.

After all, lots of places are under attack by monsters.
It's said the Royal Chivalric Order has been sent out too...

In addition to the Chivalric Order and the Guard, we also gathered
many student volunteers. Luckily, the situation is still under control.

And Sterk, you'll give us a hand, right?!
I was told you were really good with killing monsters!

It's just my duty as a knight.
I couldn't just sit by and watch you fighting.

Heehee, you're absolutely reliable!
I think we'll survive this disaster with so much support?

But... Captain, you're about to leave again?
You just came back...
Yeah. Monsters are especially rampant in Ribrum.

We just came back after finishing that quest but
only to find that another commission is waiting for us.
Ah! Let us take care of this commission of repelling monsters!

Oh, you'd like to help us?
I'll get Cresson to support you, thanks!
Yeah, Cresson is not a sure card.

What? That's so not true!
I'm better at combatting than you, Peppermint!

No no, why did you compare yourself with Peppermint?
Forget it. We'll count on you if anything happens, Cresson.

H-hold on, [px]! I'm reliable in some respects
even if I'm not good enough!

Haha, [px] was just kidding!
Try your best, Cresson.

OK, leave it to me!
Off we go, Captain!

I'll go with you. You may need as many hands
as possible to repel monsters.

Yeah! Thanks, Sterk!
Let's repel monsters and collect information!
